column1: Hi, kupo! Be sure to hit 'File", then 'Make a copy' to save to your own Google Drive. This gives you edit permissions so you can click the checkboxes and condense the rows. Please do not request edit permissions for this document! All information is accurate as of patch 6.28. Happy Hunting from Prismatic Orchid and The Pog Mogs! If this guide helps you out, come drop a line in our Message Book @ Diabolos, Coerthas, Empyreum, Ward 18, Plot 32.
